title: Ubuntu开bds服务器时遇到问题
author: minecraft牛逼
txt_content:
在输入开启服务器指令后提示
-bash: ./bedrock_server: cannot execute binary file: Exec format error
复制代码
使用sudo执行指令则提示
./bedrock_server: 1: ./bedrock_server: ELF: not found
./bedrock_server: 2: ./bedrock_server: @8: not found
./bedrock_server: 3: ./bedrock_server: @@@@0ppp?: not found
./bedrock_server: 4: ./bedrock_server: ?: not found
./bedrock_server: 5: ./bedrock_server: hB?: not found
./bedrock_server: 6: ./bedrock_server: hB?: not found
./bedrock_server: 7: ./bedrock_server: hB?: not found
./bedrock_server: 21: ./bedrock_server: Syntax error: ")" unexpected
复制代码我又尝试换了一个版本的，但是仍然出现这种情况，请问是怎么回事

replies.author: wedfwsd
replies.txt_content:
可以尝试用其它的基岩版啊
Nukkit有Linux的吧

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
用 docker 呢？

如果你会用的话 https://hub.docker.com/r/itzg/minecraft-bedrock-server

replies.author: minecraft牛逼
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-30 14:19

如果你会用的话 https://hub.docker.com/r/itzg/minecraft-bedrock-server
